DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate maintenance efficacy base time relapse SPD489 ( 50 70mg ) placebo , measure number binge day ( defined day least 1 binge episode occur ) per week assess clinical interview base subject diary Clinical Global Impression - Severity ( CGI-S ) score patient respond SPD489 end Open-label Treatment Phase .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Maintenance Efficacy SPD489 Adults Aged 18-55 Years With Moderate Severe Binge Eating Disorder
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject 1855 year age , inclusive . 2 . Subject meet follow criterion diagnosis BED : Recurrent episodes binge eat . An episode binge eat characterize following : eating , discrete period time ( eg , within 2hour period ) amount food definitely large people would eat similar period time similar condition , sense lack control eating ( eg , feel one stop eat control much one eating ) . The binge eat episode associate least 3 follow : eat much rapidly normal ; eat uncomfortably full ; eat large amount food feeling physically hungry ; eat alone embarrass much one eating ; feel disgust oneself , depress , feel guilty overeating . Marked distress regard binge eating . The binge eating occur , average , least 2 day week 6 month . The episodes binge eat occur exclusively course bulimia nervosa anorexia nervosa . 3 . Subject consistently able swallow capsule . 1 . Subject current diagnosis bulimia nervosa anorexia nervosa . 2 . Subject receive psychotherapy weight loss support within past 3 month . 3 . Subject use psychostimulants facilitate fast diet within past 6 month . 4 . Subject known history symptomatic cardiovascular disease , advanced arteriosclerosis , structural cardiac abnormality , cardiomyopathy , serious heart rhythm abnormality , coronary artery disease . 5 . Subject abnormal thyroid function . 6 . Subject initiated treatment lipid lower medication within past 3 month . 7 . Subject history moderate severe hypertension . 8 . Subject recent history ( within past 6 month ) suspect substance abuse dependence disorder . 9 . Subject glaucoma . 10 . Subject female pregnant nursing . 11 . Subjects bariatric surgery , lap band , duodenal stent , procedure weight loss .
